statements: UPDATE GameEvents SET event_name='Birthday Party' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE GameEvents SET event_description='New Achievement Unlocked' WHERE player_id=202 AND achievement_id=3;
UPDATE GameEvents SET event_name='New Event Name', event_description='Updated Description' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE GameEvents SET event_description='Achievement Unlocked', player_id=10, achievement_id=5, event_name='Updated Event Name' WHERE event_id=3;
UPDATE game_events SET event_name='New Event Name', event_description='Updated Event Description' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE player_achievements SET achievement_description='Updated Achievement Description', achievement_unlocked_date='2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE player_id=1 AND achievement_id=2;
UPDATE game_events SET event_name = 'Updated Event Name', event_description = 'New Description' WHERE event_id = 1;

UPDATE player_achievements SET achievement_name = 'New Achievement', achievement_description = 'Updated Description', achievement_unlocked_date = '2022-05-10' WHERE player_id = 101 AND achievement_id = 5;
UPDATE game_events SET event_name='New Game Launch', event_date='2022-10-01' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE rewards SET bonus_amount=500, reward_name='Big Bonus' WHERE achievement_id=3;
UPDATE game_events SET event_name = 'New Year Bash' WHERE event_id = 5;
UPDATE rewards SET bonus_amount = 100 WHERE reward_id = 10;
UPDATE game_events SET event_description = 'New Description' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE rewards SET bonus_multiplier = 1.5 WHERE reward_id = 3;
UPDATE game_events SET event_name='New Event Name', event_description='Updated Event Description' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE player_data SET total_points=1500, total_bonuses=300 WHERE player_id=5;
UPDATE game_events SET event_type = 'kill', event_timestamp = '2022-05-15 12:30:00' WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_stats SET total_points = 500, level = 10 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE game_events SET event_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE player_id = 'c7b24f7a-3e3e-44c4-b910-7e951a7cffae';
UPDATE player_stats SET level = level + 1, experience = experience + 100, high_score = 1500 WHERE player_id = 'c7b24f7a-3e3e-44c4-b910-7e951a7cffae';
